oai_dc:dc.dc:description: min taʼlīf Khwajah Nasīr al-Dīn al-Ṭūsī = Euclidis Elementorum geometricorum libri tredecim / extraditione doctissimi Nasiridini Tusini nunc primum Arabicè impressi.
Pages are numbered in numerals of the traditional Arabic font on p. 2-400 and also in modern Arabic numerals on p. 2, 7 (misnumbered 8), 8, and 25-400.
Title and text within double line borders; title vignette.
"Maqālah al-ūlá ilá al-thālithah ʻashar" on top of double line borders of the page.
